text:
@PressSec People like him brought America to where we are now. 
A divided nation
Down played the need to #WearAMask & #COVID19 
4.5M infected
151K dead & counting

While he was dying he still pushed to open up the country against med experts. Future ICU patients below. #coronavirus #Karma https://t.co/gcIYpzzkcn
